text:
Bisher Al Khasawneh (born 27 January 1969) is a Jordanian politician. He became the Prime Minister of Jordan on 7 October 2020. He was the Advisor to King Abdullah II for policies until October 2020. He was the Advisor to King Abdullah II for Communication and Coordination at The Royal Hashemite Court between April 2019 and August 2020.
He was a Minister for Legal Affairs between 2017 and 2018 and a Minister of Foreign Affairs between 2016 and 2017.
